DOC.detailed_description: Previous observational experimental research suggest increase eat frequency relate low weight , body mass index ( BMI ) body fatness . It propose eat frequently day reduce overall energy consume prevent development excessive hunger . As elevated hunger increase reinforce value food , great intake occur reinforce value food increase , eat frequently day may dietary strategy aid reduce energy intake improve weight loss behavioral weight control program . Therefore , purpose propose research test effect manipulate eat frequency hunger reinforce value food 50 overweight/obese adult participate 6-month behavioral weight loss intervention . Participants randomize 1 2 condition : 1 ) condition participant give eating frequency prescription eat every 2 3 hour ( Grazing ) ; 2 ) condition participant give eating frequency prescription eat 3 meal per day ( Three Meals ) . Both condition receive identical dietary prescription , low-calorie ( 1200 1500 kcals/d ) , low-fat ( â‰¤ 30 % kcals fat ) diet identical physical activity goal 200 minute moderate-intense physical activity per week . Additionally , condition receive identical state-of-the-art , 6-month , behavioral weight loss program .
DOC.criteria: body mass index ( BMI ) 27 45 kg/m2 report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness report unable walk 1/4 mile without stop report major psychological disease organic brain syndrome report diagnosis type I type II diabetes currently participate weight loss program , take weight loss medication , surgery weight loss , lose > 5 % body weight past 6 month currently participate program manipulates eat habit intent move outside East Tennessee area within time frame intervention pregnant , lactate , less 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant time frame intervention unwilling attend group intervention meeting , assessment , complete food diary duration study
